meanings.def: an arrangement of the parts of something or a group of things; the form or shape that this arrangement produces
examples: configuration of something The design is based on four configurations of squares.
There was a changing configuration of lights coming from the stadium.
in a configuration The stars seemed to appear in a different configuration.

meanings.def: the equipment and programs that form a computer system and the way that these are set up to run
examples: Performance will vary depending on your hardware and software configurations.
